title: Heritage Blue Stripe Stoneware Sugar & Creamer Set
features: Set includes a sugar bowl with lid and a matching creamer pitcher
Each piece hand-thrown on a traditional pottery wheel
Natural stoneware with double blue stripes
description: Handmade in the USA! As you serve up a hot cup of coffee to friends and family, just reach for this charming sugar and creamer set. Your guests will love its antique look. And you'll love having a unique, quality handmade set. (Because after all, how many things are made by hand these days?) Set includes a sugar bowl with lid and a matching creamer pitcher. Each piece hand-thrown on a traditional pottery wheel. Natural stoneware with double blue stripes. Lead-free. Microwave, oven and dishwasher safe. Sugar Bowl: 5-1/8"H, top 3-1/2"OD. Creamer Pitcher: 4"H x 3-1/4"OD. USA made in Texas.
